QuestData.Title: Seared Scourge
QuestData.Description: <Hic>... gotta burn these corpshes 'fore they shtart walkin' around again.$b$bPoppa always said, only thing worshe than havin' to kill a troll is havin' ta kill a troll twice.$b$bSay,<hic>... shpeakin' of Scourge, we can't get into tha' troll keep up north 'til we get them trolls thinned out a bit.$b$bHow 'bout ya take shome o my grog here and put them bashtards outta their misery?
QuestData.LogDescription: Mack at Granite Springs wants you to use his grog to burn 20 Famished Scourge Trolls at Drak'Tharon.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done!$b$b<Mack laughs hysterically for a moment.>$b$bAww, come on now. That was funny...<hic>.
